name: Boryproject
body:
### Foci3D tracker

A simple method to track gene foci in 3D.

### Documentation

[Javadoc](https://github.com/cmci/BoryProject/blob/master/doc/index.html)

### Reference

**Quantitative Analysis of Chromosome Condensation in Fission Yeast.**
Petrova, B., Dehler, S., Kruitwagen, T., Heriche, J.K., Miura, K. & Haering, C.H.
Mol Cell Biol. 2012 Dec 21. [pubmed](http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/23263988?dopt=Abstract)

### Authors and Contributors

Kota Miura (@cmci)
Boryana Petrova
Christian HÃ¤ring

### Support or Contact
